originalText.text: Had great results with Jenipher twice now! I get balayage and a layered cut, and she is so thorough and can transform my hairstyle with even just the initial cut. I appreciate how chill and relaxing the experience with Jenipher is. I can go many months between appointments because the coloring is so low maintenance, but I already can’t wait for my next one!

text.text: Had great results with Jenipher twice now! I get balayage and a layered cut, and she is so thorough and can transform my hairstyle with even just the initial cut. originalText.text:
Iryna has been my hair stylist for about 5 years now and she NEVER misses the mark. For reference, I have extremely thick/dark/wavy hair. Prior to Iryna, I had always struggled with achieving flowy/textured hair without it looking overly layered or having to thin my hair out too much. Now, whether I want to keep my hair short, long, or somewhere in between - it always looks amazing!  I was also never able to achieve a non brassy blonde until Iryna started doing my hair. I typically get color(double process) done twice a year and my hair always comes out looking a perfect platinum/ashy blonde. I can also maintain the color without it becoming brassy until my next visit (~every 6 months).

Aside from that, Iryna is a lovely human and is a joy to be around. Even though it can take 5+ hours to do my hair (yes it’s that thick!), I’m still always excited for my trip to Iryna’s chair.

originalText.text: Absolutety amazing. Iryna rescued my hair after a failed balayage in different salon. She is such a specialist, professional and warm person! She also gave me best advice what is the best for my hair after first salon situation to don’t damage my hair! I appreciate this. She look very individual for each person. I’m so happy I found her!!! ❤️ Thank you! Be back soon ☺️

originalText.text: I have had only the best hair experiences with Iryna at Hair Art Designs! I moved out of town 3 years ago and still primarily come to Iryna for my hair because there is NO ONE better. She has done bobs, long cuts, blonde balayage, brown balayage, and is amazing at it all. The salon itself is beautiful as well, and staff is all very friendly and professional.

originalText.text: Jenipher has been cutting and coloring my hair for a few years now and every time it comes out amazing and I always get compliments. I usually get balayage and she makes it look totally natural, which is not something anyone can do. The place itself is also beautiful and clean and a relaxing environment. She also spends the extra time explaining how to care for my hair at home and she never pushes a treatment that I don't need.
